Tools & Guides for Chimeraland

A website dedicated to the Survival, Open World, Crafting MMORPG Chimerland..

New pages are being created every day and existing pages are being updated so you'll want to check back often.



All pages should work for mobile but may not be formatted well. This will get better over time.
Fox is a self-taught web developer and this is the first sizeable project. He is committed to learning and accurately sharing information with you to enhance your gaming experience.
Questions, feedback, comments?
Contact Fox at varefox@gmail.com or on Discord as Varefox #2568, or in game.

For work prepositions, contact me!

Creating guides and tools that you can use while gaming is more than just a hobby. You can support my work here.
Thank you!
